Perfil.profile-funcion: FullStack Developer, FullStack Developer, Python (Django | Flask), Python (Django | Flask)

Secciones.about-me-contenido:
I'm a FullStack Developer, focused on modern web design, aimed at companies looking to digitize or renew their online presence.
My stack combines HTML, CSS, JavaScript (React), and Python (Django/Flask). I specialize in building custom websites that not only look good but also communicate clearly and are ready to scale.
I come from the creative world: over 15 years in advertising, copywriting, and digital marketing. That gave me an integral vision I now apply to development: I see websites as platforms for communication and strategy, not just simple pages.
I work independently with companies of all sizes looking to make the digital leap, and I especially enjoy when the process is collaborative.
I'm always open to challenging projects and also to joining visionary teams where I can contribute both technically and creatively.
